name: Grand Baton
description: '''Grand Baton''' is an [[Afro-Caribbean music|Afro-Caribbean]], [[progressive rock]] and [[Jazz|jazz fusion]] [[musical ensemble|band]] based in [[New York City]]. The band was founded by the [[composer]], arranger, [[guitarist]], [[pianist]], singer and [[songwriter]] Jean-Cristophe (JC) Maillard, a native of [[Pointe-Ã -Pitre]], [[Guadeloupe]].
